name: Retro88
description:
First of all The Game is Bad and Hard   pls dont expect alot!

Find Keys and Escape :)

The Game has been canceled due to my project getting deleted :D

Im currently working on a new optimized Game with Good  Graphics!

More info on that soon.

The Game has low frame rate because i didnt get to work on optimization,

but i guess u could add it as a retro factor ;)

Hope yall can get some fun out of my lost project :/

If you have any direct questions to me dm me on Discord
